attributes.action: Legislate a general election within 8 months after an elected PM has left post earlier than the given term.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems very Un-constitutional that when the acting PM leaves the post earlier than the expected an unelected (to PM) can become PM and not hold elctions within a specified time.  This is the case with Gordon Brown.  This petition proposes that there is a short but realistic timeframe for a general election to mitigate this concern.
